entry.title: OpenSea's Polygon NFT Sales Top Ethereum for Second Straight Month
entry.summary: The total number of Polygon NFT sales on OpenSea beat Ethereum each of the past two months—but they're mostly low-cost assets.

entry.title: Where Did All the Terra Developers Go?
entry.summary: Eight months after the epic collapse of Terra, developers who worked on the project are now finding new homes—but many have left crypto altogether.

entry.title: Cool Cats Are Going Multi-Chain—And Adding Customizable NFTs
entry.summary: The “blue chip” PFP project has refreshed its branding and dropped gamified NFTs to holders, with full-body avatars due later this year.

entry.title: NFT Sales Jump 38% in January as Bored Apes Drive Trading Surge
entry.summary: The NFT market shows signs of life amid rising crypto prices, with the Bored Ape Yacht Club leading the charge.

entry.title: Bitcoin Holds Steady as Fed Hikes Interest Rates Again
entry.summary: The Fed has raised rates by 25 basis points, meeting market expectations.

entry.title: Sam Bankman-Fried Barred From Contacting FTX Employees Via Encrypted Messages
entry.summary: The judge's decision follows Bankman-Fried’s attempt to “vet things out” with a potential witness.

entry.title: Feds Sanction Bitcoin, Ethereum Addresses Linked to Russian Arms Dealer
entry.summary: The Office of Foreign Assets Control today sanctioned crypto wallets used by the son of a Russian arms dealer.

entry.title: All the FTX Films and TV Series in Production Right Now
entry.summary: The downfall of FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried has caught the interest of Hollywood, with several high-profile projects already in development.

entry.title: Coinbase Bull Cathie Wood’s Ark Innovation ETF Has Best Month Ever
entry.summary: The fund’s value had a blockbuster month of growth among ETFs, rising nearly 28%.

entry.title: Steve Aoki, Seth Green Will Let NFT Holders Shape Animated Short
entry.summary: Shibuya, the Web3 video platform from artist pplpleasr, will host the stop-motion short that lets NFT owners call the shots.

entry.title: LBRY Token Soars 67% as Holders Turn Hopeful That Secondary Sales Won’t Be Barred
entry.summary: According to an unaffiliated attorney, the judge in the case may be poised to allow secondary sales of LBRY’s token to continue.

entry.title: UK Treasury Outlines Regulatory Plans That Make Room for Crypto’s ‘Unique Features’
entry.summary: Though the new rules would apply traditional financial guardrails to crypto, the UK Treasury is also making room for crypto’s unique features.

entry.title: US Senators: Silvergate 'Further Introduced' Crypto Risk Into Traditional Banking
entry.summary: Silvergate's dealings with FTX and Alameda demand closer examination, according to a new letter from U.S. senators including Elizabeth Warren.

entry.title: Who's Eligible to Get Their Crypto Back From Bankrupt Celsius?
entry.summary: Celsius announced that it will start letting "eligible users" withdraw their funds from the bankrupt crypto lender. But who qualifies?

entry.title: Tesla Details $140 Million Bitcoin Loss in SEC Filing
entry.summary: The electric car company saw its Bitcoin losses double since 2021.

entry.title: First Exchange-Traded NFT Fund Shuts Down
entry.summary: The Defiance Digital Revolution ETF will cease activity by the end of February.

entry.title: Ethereum Set to Trial Staking Withdrawals on Shanghai Testnet
entry.summary: A dress rehearsal for the network’s highly anticipated upgrade will allow staking firms and crypto exchanges to test users’ ability to withdraw staked ETH.

entry.title: Celsius Was Using QuickBooks for Its Accounting—Just Like FTX
entry.summary: The crypto lender tapped software to keep track of its finances primarily used by smaller businesses.

entry.title: Social Token Platform Rally Shutting Down
entry.summary: The social NFT firm is sunsetting its Ethereum sidechain, citing market headwinds.

entry.title: Here’s Why Floki Isn't Actually Going to Burn $100M Worth of Tokens
entry.summary: Did the Floki DAO really vote to destroy almost 5 trillion FLOKI tokens? Yes. Are those tokens worth $100 million? Well, it’s complicated.

entry.title: New Deal With NYDIG and B. Riley Cuts Bitcoin Miner Greenidge's Debt by $61M
entry.summary: The $61 million deal significantly reduces the sizeable debt burden facing Greenidge, which was recently considering voluntary bankruptcy.

entry.title: Celsius Problems 'Dated Back to at Least 2020': Examiner’s Report
entry.summary: The 689-page report on Celsius alleges how one of the industry’s biggest retail lenders became one of its top borrowers.

entry.title: Tron and Huobi Launch Grand Hackathon Season 4 With 500K USDD Prize Pool
entry.summary: The “HackaTron” returns with six tracks for Web3 developers, including new Builder and Eco-Friendly categories.

entry.title: Defunct Crypto Lender BlockFi Granted Approval to Sell Assets
entry.summary: Suitors for BlockFi’s distressed assets have until February 20 to make their bids following fresh approval from the bankruptcy court.

entry.title: Osprey Funds Accuses Grayscale of ‘Unfair’ Practices in Lawsuit
entry.summary: The rival asset manager Osprey says operators of GBTC knew it was never likely to become an ETF, but marketed it on this basis anyway.

entry.title: FTX Sister Firm Alameda Hits Bankrupt Voyager Digital With $446M Lawsuit
entry.summary: Alameda seeks to recover $446 million in repaid loans to the defunct digital asset manager Voyager Digital.

entry.title: Ordinals Launches NFTs on Bitcoin, Unsurprisingly Sparking Controversy
entry.summary: Digital assets on the Bitcoin blockchain are a perennial goal, but some of Bitcoin’s biggest backers don’t like the idea.

entry.title: Dungeons & Dragons Reverses Course on NFT Ban Amid Backlash
entry.summary: After abandoning proposed license changes, the Dungeons & Dragons campaign against Web3 has apparently reached its end.

entry.title: Coinbase Wallet Adds Safety Features Following High-Profile NFT Scams
entry.summary: Users will now be warned away from flagged apps and shown more detail about what certain actions will allow.

entry.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Prices Fall as Market Braces for More Fed Rate Hikes
entry.summary: BTC and ETH followed U.S. stocks today for losses of 5% and 6% on the day, respectively.

entry.title: Dogecoin Fans Still Hopeful After Elon Musk's Twitter Payments Update
entry.summary: Dogecoin saw modest gains after a report suggesting that Twitter’s payments product could support crypto.

entry.title: Binance and Mastercard Launch Bitcoin Rewards Card in Brazil
entry.summary: The new rewards card from Binance and Mastercard will offer users in Brazil up to 8% cashback on select cryptocurrencies, including Bitcoin.

entry.title: FTX Seeks to Dismiss Turkish Entities From Bankruptcy Case
entry.summary: FTX believes that continuing bankruptcy proceedings with Turkish entities involved will only result “in a waste of scarce resources.”

entry.title: Bitcoin Mining Difficulty Hits a New All-Time High
entry.summary: Mining Bitcoin just got a bit harder as the network's difficulty jumped another 4.68% on Sunday.

entry.title: Smart Stake Joins List of Secret Network Validators Shuttering Operations
entry.summary: Yet another Secret Network validator will move to shut down its nodes following the project’s governance conflict and a recent node update.

entry.title: Australian Regulators Flagged FTX Concerns Months Before Collapse: Report
entry.summary: FTX’s Australian subsidiary earned an operating license in the country by buying an existing business, say regulators.

entry.title: Feds Want Sam Bankman-Fried to Stop Contacting Potential Witnesses on Signal
entry.summary: Both legal teams involved in the disgraced FTX founder’s criminal case put forward dueling explanations for his conduct.

entry.title: MATIC Trader Turns $80K Into $4 Million as Polygon Ends Month Up 50%
entry.summary: MATIC has been moving up as a zero-knowledge chain upgrade draws closer.

entry.title: Secret Foundation Faces Calls for More Transparency, Return of Funds
entry.summary: Founder and CEO Tor Bair rejects accusations of mishandling funds and a drastic reform plan.

entry.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: Binance Faces More Insider Trading Allegations
entry.summary: Also, El Salvador’s Bitcoin-loving head of state Nayib Bukele wants the world to know that his country is still solvent.

entry.title: gm: Week in Review: Tech Layoffs, Porsche NFTs, Ted Cruz
entry.summary: In our January 28, 2023 week in review episode, Dan Roberts, Matthew Diemer, and Kate Irwin talk about more layoffs in crypto and broader tech (including how Google botched its layoffs), the NFT market rebound and Porsche’s NFT drop (fail or surprise success?), Sam Bankman-Fried’s latest claims about FTX US and the surprising list of big companies on the FTX creditor list, and Ted Cruz’s weird effort to get DC vendors to accept Bitcoin. Watch and make sure to subscribe to the gm podcast on Apple or Spotify.

entry.title: How Web3 Is Disrupting Video Streaming: Myco, Theta Labs, and Actor David Bianchi
entry.summary: At an investor event in L.A. hosted by watch-to-earn video streaming platform Myco, Decrypt's Sander Lutz moderated a discussion about Film3 with Myco CCO Phil McKenzie, Theta Labs BD Head Andrea Berry, and actor and filmmaker David Bianchi, whose Web3 series "RZR" got funding through NFT drops.

entry.title: How Web3 and NFTs Are Disrupting Film: Myco, Livepeer, Ava Labs, Bad Grrls Creative Club
entry.summary: At an investor event in New York hosted by the watch-to-earn video streaming platform Myco, Decrypt's Dan Roberts moderated a lively chat about Film3 with Phil McKenzie from Myco, Toni Thai Sterrett the founder of NFT member collective Bad Grrls Creative Club, Doug Petkanics the founder of decentralized video hosting platform Livepeer, and Daniel Killeen of Avalanche blockchain developer Ava Labs.

entry.title: 'Iron Man' Comic Artist Sean Chen on Marvel vs. Web3
entry.summary: Marvel and DC Comics alum Sean Chen argues that while studios have made billions, comic artists aren't seeing even a fraction of that wealth.

entry.title: Marvel Artist Sean Chen on How Artificial Intelligence Will Shape Comics
entry.summary: "Eventually there's still a human brain that needs to be involved," Chen said of AI being used to create comics.

entry.title: Actor David Bianchi Previews His Web3 TV Series 'RZR'
entry.summary: Veteran actor David Bianchi spoke to Decrypt's Jason Nelson right before a public table read for Bianchi's upcoming drama series "RZR," to be distributed through Gala Films. The show is already greenlit and will be set in a dystopian future Los Angeles, with Ethereum and other digital assets as part of the plot. Bianchi also conducted two NFT drops to build engagement from fans.

entry.title: gm: Farokh and the Rug Radio Roadmap
entry.summary: Meet Mr. NFT: @Farokh, who preaches daily to hundreds of thousands of NFT faithful, and is trying to building Rug Radio into a fully formed Web3 media company. Dan Roberts and Kate Irwin from the gm podcast talk to Farokh about Rug DAO and all things NFT culture. Watch and make sure to subscribe to the gm podcast on Apple or Spotify.

entry.title: gm: Big Bold Predictions for Crypto in 2023
entry.summary: Will Sam Bankman-Fried serve prison time? Who will be the next crypto company to go bankrupt, or the next founder to see their reputation dissolve? Will we get a new crypto law this year? Decrypt's Dan Roberts, Stacy Elliott, and Matthew Diemer of the gm podcast crew kicked off the new year by trading predictions for 2023. Watch and make sure to subscribe to the gm podcast on Apple or Spotify.

entry.title: Walking the Red Carpet at The Crypties 2022
entry.summary: Sander on the Street is back! Decrypt's Sander Lutz walked the red carpet and accosted attendees as they arrived at the inaugural Crypties awards gala in December 2022 at Art Basel in Miami, presented by Decrypt Studios.
